page.title: 10OUR SCHOOL AT WOOLAVINGTON
page.content: Woolavington school is also a split site school with the infants remaining on the old school site and the Juniors moving to the{new annex.}The annex was built in 1976 exactly{100 years after the original school was opened.It is hoped that the new building will be completed during the next few years and then we can be all on one site.There are 160 pupils in the school,58 infants and 92 Juniors. Children can start at the school in the year they become five and leave to attend secondary school after 7 years. Our school day is divided into {different lessons.}In the morning we mainly do maths and english and in the afternoon topic work and games.For sport we are divided into three houses.We play against other schools mainly football,rounders netball and athletics.
